General.Name: Cheviot Company Limited
General.Description: Cheviot Company Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of jute goods in India. The company offers jute shopping bags, jute yarns, and Hessian cloth and bags. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Budge Budge Amalgamated Mills Limited. The company was incorporated in 1897 and is headquartered in Kolkata, India. Cheviot Company Limited is a subsidiary of Harsh Investments Private Limited.
